author: max
name: History
install_msg:
Thanks for installing.
Users can set their own timezone to align with their local midnight via `[p]historyset timezone`.
<https://docs.maxapp.tv/docs/history.html> for documentation.
If you enjoy my work, you can donate at [buymeacoffee](<https://buymeacoffee.com/ltzmax>)
description: A cog to display historical events for the current day.
short: A cog to display historical events for the current day.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any End User Data.
